title: Every morning at 8:30a, talk radio turns on my Pixel 3a. I don't have any alarms set for this time?
content: I've triple checked my clock settings, and I don't have bedtime enabled or anything. There's not even a silence option that I can hit when this happens, it just won't turn off! I have to put my phone on DND for a while before it stops. Very frustrating.
